dict.acceptation: 依靠，倚赖，仗恃；信任，信赖；

sent.orig: We had no computer backup and had to rely on old paper files to reconstruct the records.
sent.trans: 我们没有计算机备份，只得靠落后的纸档案重做记录。

sent.orig: That will hurt exporters in Asia, which rely on American consumers to buy their products.
sent.trans: 那将会伤害亚洲的出口商。他们需要美国消费者去买他们的商品。

sent.orig: Even with their dummy distractions, ventriloquists still rely on the age-old techniques of spiritual mediums.
sent.trans: 即使有人偶作为障眼法，腹语表演者仍旧依赖灵媒长年所使用的技巧。

sent.orig: Championship last season, Bayern rely on solid defense, the 21 Bundesliga goals against Guanjue.
sent.trans: 上赛季夺冠，拜仁靠的是坚固的防守，21个失球冠绝德甲。

sent.orig: During the process of industrialization people rely on energy more than ever before.
sent.trans: 在工业化的过程中人们对能源的依赖比以往任何时期都要历害。
